title: What goes into the blast furnace?
creator_credit: John Durst, Frank A. Hoare and Merton Park
brief_description: The manner in which the raw materials used in a blast furnace - iron ore, coke and limestone - are crushed, blended and otherwise prepared before use in a furnace. Animated diagrams explain the use of a continuous hot air blast.
creator_credit_for_label: John Durst, Frank A. Hoare and Merton Park
